DataSource.name: prmd
DataSource.SelectSQLQuery: SELECT A.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID,A.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID,A.DTYP_DATA_TYPE_ID,B.DTYP_DATA_TYPE_LGND, C.CD_DESC_TXT,A.LINE_VAL,A.BLN_BNFT_LINE_PVA,D.CD_DESC_TXT,A.BNFT_LVL_EXTRNL_RFRNC_ID, GETREFDATADESC(E.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_TERM,1934) BLVL_BNFT_LVL_TERM_DESC , GETREFDATADESC(E.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_QLFR,1935) BLVL_BNFT_LVL_QLFR_DESC , E.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_DESC,E.BNFT_LVL_SQNC,E.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_TERM,E.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_QLFR, DECODE((SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM NOTE_DOMN_ASSN WHERE ENTY_SYS_ID = to_char(A.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID) AND ENTY_TYPE = 'ATTACHBNFTLINE' AND BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID = {0}), 0, 'N','Y') notes_exists, A.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID,E.BLVL_BNFT_FRQNCY_QLFR from BLN_BNFT_LINE A, DTYP_DATA_TYPE B,ITEM C, ITEM D,BLVL_BNFT_LVL E, (SELECT BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID levelId FROM BLVL_BNFT_LVL WHERE BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID = {0} order by BNFT_LVL_SQNC)H WHERE A.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID IN (H.levelId) AND A.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID = {0} AND A.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID = E.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID AND E.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID = A.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID AND A.DTYP_DATA_TYPE_ID = B.DTYP_DATA_TYPE_ID(+) AND (A.BLN_BNFT_LINE_PVA = C.PRMRY_CD(+) AND C.CTLG_ID(+) = 1936) AND (A.BNFT_LVL_EXTRNL_RFRNC_ID = D.PRMRY_CD(+) AND D.CTLG_ID(+) = 1938) AND E.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_TERM like {1} order by E.BNFT_LVL_SQNC,A.BLN_BNFT_LINE_PVA asc
CALL PERSISTBENEFITLEVEL({0},{1},{2},{3},{4},{5},{6},{7})

select DISTINCT A.BNFT_SYS_ID, (select count(BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID) from BNFT_CMPNT_BNFT_CSTMZD where BNFT_SYS_ID = A.BNFT_SYS_ID AND BNFT_LVL_HIDE_FLAG = 'F' AND BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID ={0}) COUNT from BNFT_CMPNT_BNFT_CSTMZD A where A.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID={0}

SELECT PROD.BNFT_LVL_SQNC, PROD.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID, CASE WHEN CONT.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID IS NULL THEN PROD.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_DESC ELSE CONT.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_DESC END BLVL_BNFT_LVL_DESC, PROD.QUALIFIER_DESC, PROD.REF_DESC, PROD.BNFT_LVL_EXTRNL_RFRNC_ID, PROD.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID, PROD.DTYP_DATA_TYPE_ID, PROD.DTYP_DATA_TYPE_NAME, PROD.PVA_DESC, CASE WHEN CONT.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID IS NULL THEN PROD.LINE_VAL ELSE CONT.BNFT_LINE_CODED_VAL END BNFT_LINE_CODED_VAL, PROD.DTYP_DATA_TYPE_LGND, PROD.BNFT_TYPE, PROD.PVA_ID, PROD.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID, PROD.PROD_SYS_ID, DECODE(NN.NOTE_BENLINE_ID,NULL, 'N','Y') NOTES_EXISTS, PROD.BVAL_BNFT_VAL, PROD.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_TERM, PROD.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_QLFR, PROD.TERM_DESC, 'N' TIER_LEVEL_EXIST, DECODE( (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PROD_TIER_DEFN_OVRD WHERE BNFT_COMP_SYS_ID = {1} AND BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID = PROD.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID AND PROD_SYS_ID = PROD.PROD_SYS_ID ),0,'N','Y') TIER_DEFN_EXIST, CASE WHEN CONT.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID IS NULL THEN PROD.BLVL_BNFT_FRQNCY_QLFR1 ELSE CONT.BLVL_BNFT_QLFR_FRQNCY END BLVL_BNFT_FRQNCY_QLFR1, PROD.BLVL_BNFT_FRQNCY_QLFR2, PROD.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_DESC FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT C.BNFT_LVL_SQNC, C.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID, A.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_DESC, GETREFDATADESC(C.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_QLFR,1935) QUALIFIER_DESC, H.CD_DESC_TXT REF_DESC, D.BNFT_LVL_EXTRNL_RFRNC_ID, D.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID, T.DTYP_DATA_TYPE_ID, T.DTYP_DATA_TYPE_NAME, I.CD_DESC_TXT PVA_DESC, A.BVAL_BNFT_VAL, T.DTYP_DATA_TYPE_LGND, Z.BNFT_TYPE, I.PRMRY_CD PVA_ID, A.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID, B.PROD_SYS_ID, NULL LINE_VAL, C.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_TERM, C.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_QLFR, GETREFDATADESC(C.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_TERM,1934) TERM_DESC, A.BLVL_BNFT_FRQNCY_QLFR BLVL_BNFT_FRQNCY_QLFR1, A.BLVL_BNFT_FRQNCY_QLFR BLVL_BNFT_FRQNCY_QLFR2 FROM BLVL_BNFT_LVL C , BLN_BNFT_LINE D , BMST_BNFT_MSTR Z , ITEM H ,ITEM I ,DTYP_DATA_TYPE T , PROD_BNFT_CSTMZD A ,CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT B WHERE C.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID = A.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID AND D.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID = C.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID AND D.DTYP_DATA_TYPE_ID = T.DTYP_DATA_TYPE_ID AND A.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID = D.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID AND C.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID = A.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID AND D.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID = A.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID AND A.BNFT_SYS_ID = Z.BNFT_SYS_ID AND A.PROD_SYS_ID = B.PROD_SYS_ID AND D.BNFT_LVL_EXTRNL_RFRNC_ID = H.PRMRY_CD (+) AND H.CTLG_ID (+) = 1938 -- Reference AND D.BLN_BNFT_LINE_PVA = I.PRMRY_CD AND I.CTLG_ID = 1936 -- Provider Arrangement AND A.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = {1} AND A.BNFT_SYS_ID = {0} AND B.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = {2} AND A.BNFT_LVL_HIDE_FLAG = 'F' AND A.BNFT_LINE_HIDE_FLAG = 'F' ) PROD LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT X.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID, X.BNFT_SYS_ID,X.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID, X.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID,X.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID, X.BNFT_LINE_CODED_VAL,X.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_DESC, X.BLVL_BNFT_QLFR_FRQNCY FROM CNTRCT_BNFT_CODED_LINES X WHERE X.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = {2} AND X.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = {1} AND X.BNFT_SYS_ID = {0} ) CONT ON PROD.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID = CONT.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT SCNDRY_ENTY_ID AS NOTE_BENLINE_ID FROM NOTE_DOMAIN_OVRD_VAL WHERE PRMRY_ENTY_TYPE = 'ATTACHCONTRACT' AND SCNDRY_ENTY_TYPE ='ATTACHBNFTLINE' AND BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = {1} AND PRMRY_ENTY_ID = {2} AND NOTE_OVRD_STTS ='F' ) NN ON PROD.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID = NN.NOTE_BENLINE_ID ORDER BY PROD.BNFT_LVL_SQNC,PROD.PVA_ID

select distinct c.BNFT_LVL_SQNC,c.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID, c.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_DESC, g.CD_DESC_TXT, h.CD_DESC_TXT, d.BNFT_LVL_EXTRNL_RFRNC_ID,d.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID, t.DTYP_DATA_TYPE_ID, t.DTYP_DATA_TYPE_NAME ,i.CD_DESC_TXT , e.BNFT_LINE_CODED_VAL, t.DTYP_DATA_TYPE_LGND,a.BNFT_TYPE,i.PRMRY_CD, DECODE((SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM NOTE_DOMAIN_OVRD_VAL WHERE PRMRY_ENTY_ID = {2} and PRMRY_ENTY_TYPE = 'ATTACHCONTRACT' and SCNDRY_ENTY_TYPE ='ATTACHBNFTLINE' and SCNDRY_ENTY_ID = d.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID and NOTE_OVRD_STTS ='F'), 0, 'N','Y') notes_exists from BMST_BNFT_MSTR a,BDM_BNFT_DEFN_MSTR b, BLVL_BNFT_LVL c, BLN_BNFT_LINE d, CNTRCT_BNFT_CODED_LINES e, item g, item h , item i, DTYP_DATA_TYPE t, BCM_BNFT_CMPNT_MSTR z where b.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID = c.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID and a.BNFT_SYS_ID = b.BNFT_SYS_ID and d.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID = c.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID AND d.DTYP_DATA_TYPE_ID = t.DTYP_DATA_TYPE_ID and e.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID = d.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID and c.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID = e.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID and c.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_QLFR = g.PRMRY_CD(+) and g.CTLG_ID(+) = 1935 -- Qualifier and d.BNFT_LVL_EXTRNL_RFRNC_ID = h.PRMRY_CD (+) and h.CTLG_ID (+) = 1938 -- Reference and d.BLN_BNFT_LINE_PVA = i.PRMRY_CD and i.CTLG_ID = 1936 -- Provider Arrangement and e.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = {2} and e.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = {1} and b.BNFT_SYS_ID = {0} and e.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = z.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID and TRUNC(z.BNFT_CMPNT_EFCTV_DT) >= TRUNC(b.BNFT_DEFN_EFCTV_DT) AND TRUNC(b.BNFT_DEFN_EXPIRY_DT) >= TRUNC(z.BNFT_CMPNT_EXPIRY_DT) ORDER BY c.BNFT_LVL_SQNC,d.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID,i.PRMRY_CD asc

SelectSQLQuery.name: getAllBenefitLinesWithoutPvaValidation
SelectSQLQuery.STATIC: select distinct c.BNFT_LVL_SQNC,c.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID, c.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_DESC, g.CD_DESC_TXT, h.CD_DESC_TXT, d.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID, t.DTYP_DATA_TYPE_ID, t.DTYP_DATA_TYPE_NAME ,i.CD_DESC_TXT , e.BVAL_BNFT_VAL, t.DTYP_DATA_TYPE_LGND,z.BNFT_TYPE ,i.PRMRY_CD, e.BNFT_LINE_HIDE_FLAG, DECODE(nn.NOTE_BENLINE_ID,null, 'N','Y') notes_exists ,e.BNFT_LVL_HIDE_FLAG,e.PROD_BNFT_CSTMZD_SYS_ID,d.LINE_VAL,c.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_TERM,c.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_QLFR, j.CD_DESC_TXT,e.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID,e.PROD_SYS_ID, DECODE((select count(*) from prod_bnft_tier_custmzd where PROD_SYS_ID = {2} and BNFT_SYS_ID = {0} and BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = {1} and BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID =c.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID ),0,'N','Y') TIER_LEVEL_EXIST, DECODE((select count(*) from PROD_TIER_DEFN_OVRD where BNFT_COMP_SYS_ID = {1} and BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID =e.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID and PROD_SYS_ID =e.PROD_SYS_ID),0,'N','Y') TIER_DEFN_EXIST ,e.BLVL_BNFT_FRQNCY_QLFR,e.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_DESC,a.BLVL_BNFT_FRQNCY_QLFR,a.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_DESC from BLVL_BNFT_LVL c, BLN_BNFT_LINE d, PROD_BNFT_CSTMZD e, BMST_BNFT_MSTR z, item g, item h , item i,item j, DTYP_DATA_TYPE t, (select DISTINCT SCNDRY_ENTY_ID as NOTE_BENLINE_ID from NOTE_DOMAIN_OVRD_VAL where PRMRY_ENTY_TYPE = 'ATTACHPRODUCT' and SCNDRY_ENTY_TYPE ='ATTACHBNFTLINE'and BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = {1} and PRMRY_ENTY_ID = {2} and NOTE_OVRD_STTS ='F') nn,PROD_STRCTR_BNFT_CSTMZD a where c.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID = e.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID and d.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID = c.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID AND d.DTYP_DATA_TYPE_ID = t.DTYP_DATA_TYPE_ID and e.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID = d.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID and c.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID = e.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID and d.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID = e.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID and c.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_TERM = j.PRMRY_CD(+) and j.CTLG_ID(+) = 1934 -- Term and c.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_QLFR = g.PRMRY_CD(+) and g.CTLG_ID(+) = 1935 -- Qualifier and d.BNFT_LVL_EXTRNL_RFRNC_ID = h.PRMRY_CD (+) and h.CTLG_ID (+) = 1938 -- Reference and d.BLN_BNFT_LINE_PVA = i.PRMRY_CD and i.CTLG_ID = 1936 -- Provider Arrangement and e.PROD_SYS_ID = {2} and e.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = {1} and e.BNFT_SYS_ID = {0} and z.BNFT_SYS_ID = e.BNFT_SYS_ID AND d.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID = nn.NOTE_BENLINE_ID(+) and a.PROD_STRCTR_SYS_ID = e.PROD_STRCTR_SYS_ID and a.BNFT_SYS_ID = e.BNFT_SYS_ID and a.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = {1} and a.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID = e.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID and a.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID = e.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID

SelectSQLQuery.name: getAllBenefitLines
SelectSQLQuery.STATIC: select distinct c.BNFT_LVL_SQNC,c.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID, e.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_DESC, GETREFDATADESC(c.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_QLFR,1935) CD_DESC_TXT, h.CD_DESC_TXT, d.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID, t.DTYP_DATA_TYPE_ID, t.DTYP_DATA_TYPE_NAME ,i.CD_DESC_TXT , e.BVAL_BNFT_VAL, t.DTYP_DATA_TYPE_LGND,z.BNFT_TYPE ,i.PRMRY_CD, e.BNFT_LINE_HIDE_FLAG, DECODE(nn.NOTE_BENLINE_ID,null, 'N','Y') notes_exists ,e.BNFT_LVL_HIDE_FLAG,e.PROD_BNFT_CSTMZD_SYS_ID,d.LINE_VAL,c.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_TERM,c.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_QLFR, GETREFDATADESC(c.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_TERM,1934) CD_DESC_TXT,e.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID,e.PROD_SYS_ID, DECODE((select count(*) from prod_bnft_tier_custmzd where PROD_SYS_ID = {2} and BNFT_SYS_ID = {0} and BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = {1} and BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID =c.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID ),0,'N','Y') TIER_LEVEL_EXIST, DECODE((select count(*) from PROD_TIER_DEFN_OVRD where BNFT_COMP_SYS_ID = {1} and BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID =e.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID and PROD_SYS_ID =e.PROD_SYS_ID),0,'N','Y') TIER_DEFN_EXIST ,e.BLVL_BNFT_FRQNCY_QLFR,e.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_DESC,a.BLVL_BNFT_FRQNCY_QLFR,a.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_DESC from PROD_STRCTR_BNFT_CSTMZD a,BLVL_BNFT_LVL c, BLN_BNFT_LINE d, PROD_BNFT_CSTMZD e, BMST_BNFT_MSTR z, --item g, item h , item i, --item j, DTYP_DATA_TYPE t, (select DISTINCT SCNDRY_ENTY_ID as NOTE_BENLINE_ID from NOTE_DOMAIN_OVRD_VAL where PRMRY_ENTY_TYPE = 'ATTACHPRODUCT' and SCNDRY_ENTY_TYPE ='ATTACHBNFTLINE'and BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = {1} and PRMRY_ENTY_ID = {2} and NOTE_OVRD_STTS ='F') nn where c.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID = e.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID and d.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID = c.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID AND d.DTYP_DATA_TYPE_ID = t.DTYP_DATA_TYPE_ID and e.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID = d.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID and c.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID = e.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID and d.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID = e.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID --and c.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_TERM = j.PRMRY_CD(+) and j.CTLG_ID(+) = 1934 -- Term --and c.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_QLFR = g.PRMRY_CD(+) and g.CTLG_ID(+) = 1935 -- Qualifier and d.BNFT_LVL_EXTRNL_RFRNC_ID = h.PRMRY_CD (+) and h.CTLG_ID (+) = 1938 -- Reference and d.BLN_BNFT_LINE_PVA = i.PRMRY_CD and i.CTLG_ID = 1936 -- Provider Arrangement and e.PROD_SYS_ID = {2} and e.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = {1} and e.BNFT_SYS_ID = {0} and z.BNFT_SYS_ID = {0} AND a.PROD_STRCTR_SYS_ID = e.PROD_STRCTR_SYS_ID and a.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = {1} and a.BNFT_SYS_ID = {0} and a.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID = e.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID and a.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID = e.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID AND d.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID = nn.NOTE_BENLINE_ID(+)
and IsValidPVA('product',{2}, 'line',d.BLN_BNFT_LINE_PVA )='T' ORDER BY c.BNFT_LVL_SQNC,i.PRMRY_CD asc

DataSource.SelectSQLQuery: select c.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID, e.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_DESC, GETREFDATADESC(c.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_TERM,1934) CD_DESC_TXT, h.CD_DESC_TXT, d.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID, t.DTYP_DATA_TYPE_ID, t.DTYP_DATA_TYPE_NAME ,i.CD_DESC_TXT , e.BVAL_BNFT_VAL, t.DTYP_DATA_TYPE_LGND,z.BNFT_TYPE,i.PRMRY_CD, DECODE(nn.NOTE_BENLINE_ID,null, 'N','Y') notes_exists,e.BNFT_LVL_HIDE_FLAG, e.BNFT_LINE_HIDE_FLAG,c.BNFT_LVL_SQNC,d.LINE_VAL,e.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID,c.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_TERM, GETREFDATADESC(c.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_QLFR ,1935) Qualifier,e.BLVL_BNFT_FRQNCY_QLFR,c.blvl_bnft_lvl_qlfr,C.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_TERM,C.BLVL_BNFT_FRQNCY_QLFR, C.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_DESC from BLVL_BNFT_LVL c, BLN_BNFT_LINE d, BNFT_CMPNT_BNFT_CSTMZD e, item h , item i, DTYP_DATA_TYPE t, BMST_BNFT_MSTR z, (select DISTINCT SCNDRY_ENTY_ID as NOTE_BENLINE_ID from NOTE_DOMAIN_OVRD_VAL WHERE PRMRY_ENTY_ID = {1} and PRMRY_ENTY_TYPE = {3} and SCNDRY_ENTY_TYPE ='ATTACHBNFTLINE' and NOTE_OVRD_STTS ='F') nn where c.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID = e.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID and d.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID = c.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID AND d.DTYP_DATA_TYPE_ID = t.DTYP_DATA_TYPE_ID and e.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID = d.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID and c.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID = e.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID and d.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID = e.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID --and c.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_TERM = g.PRMRY_CD(+) and g.CTLG_ID(+) = 1934 -- Term --and c.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_QLFR = g.PRMRY_CD(+) and g.CTLG_ID(+) = 1935 -- Qualifier and d.BNFT_LVL_EXTRNL_RFRNC_ID = h.PRMRY_CD (+) and h.CTLG_ID (+) = 1938 -- Reference and d.BLN_BNFT_LINE_PVA = i.PRMRY_CD and i.CTLG_ID = 1936 -- Provider Arrangement and e.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = {4} and e.BNFT_SYS_ID = {2} and z.BNFT_SYS_ID = {2} AND d.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID = nn.NOTE_BENLINE_ID(+) and e.BNFT_LVL_HIDE_FLAG = 'F' and e.BNFT_LINE_HIDE_FLAG = 'F' ORDER BY c.BNFT_LVL_SQNC,i.PRMRY_CD asc

DataSource.SelectSQLQuery: SELECT UNIQUE a.qstnr_hrchy_sys_id, a.adqm_admn_qstn_nbr, c.adqm_admn_qstn_desc, a.rfrnc_id, d.cd_desc_txt, a.prnt_qstnr_hrchy_sys_id, b.ovrd_answr_id, e.psbl_answr, a.sqnc_nbr, f.admn_opt_parnt_sys_id, g.dtyp_data_type_lgnd, c.PRVDR_ARNGMNT,b.dt_sgmnt_sys_id,b.admin_opt_sys_id ,case (select 'Y' from note_domain_ovrd_val where prmry_enty_type='ATTACHCONTRACT' and prmry_enty_id= {0} and scndry_enty_id=a.admin_opt_sys_id and scndry_enty_type='ATTACHADMNQUEST' and adqm_admn_qstn_nbr=C.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR) WHEN 'Y' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS NOTE_EXIST, DECODE((SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM QSTN_DOMN_ASSN WHERE DOMN_CD IN ('INFO-CC','INFO-SS','C-CNFG','C-MNUL') and ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR = C.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR), 0, 'N','Y') VALID_DOMAIN FROM qstnr_mstr a, cntrct_admin_qstn_answr_ovrd b, adqm_admn_qstn_mstr c, item d, psbl_answr e, admin_opt_mstr f, dtyp_data_type g WHERE a.qstnr_hrchy_sys_id = b.qstnr_hrchy_sys_id AND a.admin_opt_sys_id = b.admin_opt_sys_id AND b.admin_opt_sys_id = f.admin_opt_sys_id AND a.adqm_admn_qstn_nbr = c.adqm_admn_qstn_nbr AND c.dtyp_data_type_id = g.dtyp_data_type_id AND a.rfrnc_id = d.prmry_cd(+) AND d.ctlg_id(+) = 1938 AND b.ovrd_answr_id = e.psbl_answr_id AND b.dt_sgmnt_sys_id = {0} AND b.admin_opt_sys_id = {1} ORDER BY a.sqnc_nbr

SELECT UNIQUE a.qstnr_hrchy_sys_id, c.adqm_admn_qstn_desc, a.rfrnc_id, e.psbl_answr FROM qstnr_mstr a, cntrct_admin_qstn_answr_ovrd b, adqm_admn_qstn_mstr c, psbl_answr e, admin_opt_mstr f WHERE a.qstnr_hrchy_sys_id = b.qstnr_hrchy_sys_id AND a.admin_opt_sys_id = b.admin_opt_sys_id AND b.admin_opt_sys_id = f.admin_opt_sys_id AND a.adqm_admn_qstn_nbr = c.adqm_admn_qstn_nbr AND b.ovrd_answr_id = e.psbl_answr_id AND b.dt_sgmnt_sys_id = {0} AND (a.rfrnc_id = {1} OR c.adqm_admn_qstn_desc = {2})

SELECT UNIQUE a.qstnr_hrchy_sys_id, a.adqm_admn_qstn_nbr, c.adqm_admn_qstn_desc, a.rfrnc_id, d.cd_desc_txt, a.prnt_qstnr_hrchy_sys_id, b.ovrd_answr_id, e.psbl_answr, a.sqnc_nbr, f.admn_opt_parnt_sys_id, g.dtyp_data_type_lgnd, c.prvdr_arngmnt FROM qstnr_mstr a, cntrct_admin_qstn_answr_ovrd b, adqm_admn_qstn_mstr c, item d, psbl_answr e, admin_opt_mstr f, dtyp_data_type g WHERE a.qstnr_hrchy_sys_id = b.qstnr_hrchy_sys_id AND a.admin_opt_sys_id = b.admin_opt_sys_id AND b.admin_opt_sys_id = f.admin_opt_sys_id AND a.adqm_admn_qstn_nbr = c.adqm_admn_qstn_nbr AND c.dtyp_data_type_id = g.dtyp_data_type_id AND a.rfrnc_id = d.prmry_cd AND d.ctlg_id = 1938 AND b.ovrd_answr_id = e.psbl_answr_id AND UPPER (e.psbl_answr) != 'NOT ANSWERED' AND b.dt_sgmnt_sys_id = {0} AND b.admin_opt_sys_id = {1} ORDER BY a.sqnc_nbr

SELECT a.qstnr_hrchy_sys_id, a.adqm_admn_qstn_nbr, a.prnt_qstnr_hrchy_sys_id, a.rfrnc_id, c.psbl_answr_id, b.adqm_admn_qstn_desc, c.psbl_answr, d.cd_desc_txt, a.sqnc_nbr,b.prvdr_arngmnt, DECODE((SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM NOTE_DOMAIN_OVRD_VAL WHERE PRMRY_ENTY_ID = {3} AND PRMRY_ENTY_TYPE = 'ATTACHCONTRACT' AND SCNDRY_ENTY_ID ={4} and SCNDRY_ENTY_TYPE = 'ATTACHADMNQUEST' and ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR=b.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR), 0, 'N','Y') NOTE_EXISTS , DECODE((SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM QSTN_DOMN_ASSN WHERE DOMN_CD IN ('INFO-CC','INFO-SS','C-CNFG','C-MNUL') and ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR = b.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR), 0, 'N','Y') VALID_DOMAIN FROM qstnr_mstr a, adqm_admn_qstn_mstr b, psbl_answr c, item d, cmst_cntrct_mstr e WHERE b.adqm_admn_qstn_nbr = a.adqm_admn_qstn_nbr AND c.adqm_admn_qstn_nbr = a.adqm_admn_qstn_nbr AND prnt_answr_id = {0} AND prnt_qstnr_hrchy_sys_id = {1} AND UPPER (c.psbl_answr) = 'NOT ANSWERED' AND a.rfrnc_id = d.prmry_cd(+) AND d.ctlg_id(+) = 1938 AND e.cntrct_sys_id = {2} AND isdomainvalid ('contract', e.cntrct_parnt_sys_id, 'QUESTION', qstnr_hrchy_sys_id ) = 'T' ORDER BY a.sqnc_nbr

SQLTemplate.SQLQuery: DELETE FROM CNTRCT_ADMIN_QSTN_ANSWR_OVRD WHERE DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID =? AND ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID =?

INSERT INTO CNTRCT_ADMIN_QSTN_ANSWR_OVRD (DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID, QSTNR_HRCHY_SYS_ID, ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID, OVRD_ANSWR_ID, LST_CHG_USR, LST_CHG_TMS, CREATD_USER_ID, CREATD_TM_STMP ) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)

DataSource.name: prmd
DataSource.SelectSQLQuery: select CNTRCT_TIER_SYS_ID from CNTRCT_TIER_MSTR where CNTRCT_TIER_SYS_ID = {0}

SelectSQLQuery.name: getTierCriteriaForContract
SelectSQLQuery.STATIC: select unique A.CNTRCT_TIER_SYS_ID, B.TIER_CRTRIA_SYS_ID, B.CRTRIA_VAL,A.TIER_DEFN_SYS_ID,C.TIER_DESC,D.CRTRIA_NM,D.DSPLY_SQNC_NBR,D.TIER_CRTRIA_IND,C.DATA_TYP from CNTRCT_TIER_MSTR A, CNTRCT_TIER_CRTRIA_VAL B, TIER_DEFN C, TIER_CRTRIA D where A.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID ={0} AND A.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID ={1} AND A.BNFT_SYS_ID ={2} AND A.CNTRCT_TIER_SYS_ID =B.CNTRCT_TIER_SYS_ID AND A.TIER_DEFN_SYS_ID =C.TIER_DEFN_SYS_ID AND B.TIER_CRTRIA_SYS_ID =D.TIER_CRTRIA_SYS_ID ORDER BY C.TIER_DESC,A.CNTRCT_TIER_SYS_ID,D.DSPLY_SQNC_NBR

SelectSQLQuery.name: getTierCriteriaForBenefitInContract
SelectSQLQuery.STATIC: select unique A.CNTRCT_TIER_SYS_ID, B.TIER_CRTRIA_SYS_ID, B.CRTRIA_VAL,A.TIER_DEFN_SYS_ID,C.TIER_DESC,D.CRTRIA_NM,D.DSPLY_SQNC_NBR,D.TIER_CRTRIA_IND,C.DATA_TYP from CNTRCT_TIER_MSTR A, CNTRCT_TIER_CRTRIA_VAL B, TIER_DEFN C, TIER_CRTRIA D where A.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID in(select dt_sgmnt_sys_id from cntrct_dt_sgmnt_assn where cntrct_sys_id={0}) AND A.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID ={1} AND A.BNFT_SYS_ID ={2} AND A.CNTRCT_TIER_SYS_ID =B.CNTRCT_TIER_SYS_ID AND A.TIER_DEFN_SYS_ID =C.TIER_DEFN_SYS_ID AND B.TIER_CRTRIA_SYS_ID =D.TIER_CRTRIA_SYS_ID ORDER BY C.TIER_DESC,A.CNTRCT_TIER_SYS_ID,D.DSPLY_SQNC_NBR

SelectSQLQuery.name: getTierCriteriaForGeneralBenefitsInContract
SelectSQLQuery.STATIC: select unique A.CNTRCT_TIER_SYS_ID, B.TIER_CRTRIA_SYS_ID, B.CRTRIA_VAL,A.TIER_DEFN_SYS_ID,C.TIER_DESC,D.CRTRIA_NM,D.DSPLY_SQNC_NBR,D.TIER_CRTRIA_IND,C.DATA_TYP from CNTRCT_TIER_MSTR A, CNTRCT_TIER_CRTRIA_VAL B, TIER_DEFN C, TIER_CRTRIA D where A.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID in(select dt_sgmnt_sys_id from cntrct_dt_sgmnt_assn where cntrct_sys_id={0}) AND A.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID =( SELECT a.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id FROM CNTRCT_BNFT_ASSN a, BCM_BNFT_CMPNT_MSTR b WHERE a.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id = b.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id AND b.bnft_cmpnt_nm = 'GENERAL BENEFITS' AND a.dt_sgmnt_sys_id in(select dt_sgmnt_sys_id from cntrct_dt_sgmnt_assn where cntrct_sys_id={0}) GROUP BY a.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id) AND A.BNFT_SYS_ID =( SELECT a.bnft_sys_id FROM CNTRCT_BNFT_ASSN a, BCM_BNFT_CMPNT_MSTR b WHERE a.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id = b.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id AND b.bnft_cmpnt_nm = 'GENERAL BENEFITS' AND a.dt_sgmnt_sys_id in(select dt_sgmnt_sys_id from cntrct_dt_sgmnt_assn where cntrct_sys_id={0}) GROUP BY a.bnft_sys_id) AND A.CNTRCT_TIER_SYS_ID =B.CNTRCT_TIER_SYS_ID AND A.TIER_DEFN_SYS_ID =C.TIER_DEFN_SYS_ID AND B.TIER_CRTRIA_SYS_ID =D.TIER_CRTRIA_SYS_ID ORDER BY C.TIER_DESC,A.CNTRCT_TIER_SYS_ID,D.DSPLY_SQNC_NBR

SelectSQLQuery.name: getTierCriteriaForProduct
SelectSQLQuery.STATIC: select unique A.PROD_TIER_SYS_ID, B.TIER_CRTRIA_SYS_ID, B.CRTRIA_VAL, A.TIER_DEFN_SYS_ID, C.TIER_DESC, D.CRTRIA_NM, D.DSPLY_SQNC_NBR, D.TIER_CRTRIA_IND,C.DATA_TYP from PROD_TIER_MSTR A, PROD_TIER_CRTRIA_VAL B, TIER_DEFN C, TIER_CRTRIA D where A.PROD_SYS_ID ={0} AND A.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID ={1} AND A.BNFT_SYS_ID ={2} AND A.PROD_TIER_SYS_ID = B.PROD_TIER_SYS_ID AND A.TIER_DEFN_SYS_ID =C.TIER_DEFN_SYS_ID AND B.TIER_CRTRIA_SYS_ID =D.TIER_CRTRIA_SYS_ID ORDER BY C.TIER_DESC,A.PROD_TIER_SYS_ID,D.DSPLY_SQNC_NBR

SelectSQLQuery.name: getTierCriteriaForGeneralBenefitsInProduct
SelectSQLQuery.STATIC: select unique A.PROD_TIER_SYS_ID, B.TIER_CRTRIA_SYS_ID, B.CRTRIA_VAL, A.TIER_DEFN_SYS_ID, C.TIER_DESC, D.CRTRIA_NM, D.DSPLY_SQNC_NBR, D.TIER_CRTRIA_IND,C.DATA_TYP from PROD_TIER_MSTR A, PROD_TIER_CRTRIA_VAL B, TIER_DEFN C, TIER_CRTRIA D where A.PROD_SYS_ID ={0} AND A.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID =( SELECT x.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id FROM PROD_BNFT_CSTMZD x, BCM_BNFT_CMPNT_MSTR y WHERE x.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id = y.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id AND y.bnft_cmpnt_nm = 'GENERAL BENEFITS' AND x.prod_sys_id = {0} GROUP BY x.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id) AND A.BNFT_SYS_ID =(SELECT x.bnft_sys_id FROM PROD_BNFT_CSTMZD x, BCM_BNFT_CMPNT_MSTR y WHERE x.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id = y.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id AND y.bnft_cmpnt_nm = 'GENERAL BENEFITS' AND x.prod_sys_id = {0} GROUP BY x.bnft_sys_id ) AND A.PROD_TIER_SYS_ID = B.PROD_TIER_SYS_ID AND A.TIER_DEFN_SYS_ID =C.TIER_DEFN_SYS_ID AND B.TIER_CRTRIA_SYS_ID =D.TIER_CRTRIA_SYS_ID ORDER BY C.TIER_DESC,A.PROD_TIER_SYS_ID,D.DSPLY_SQNC_NBR

SelectSQLQuery.name: getBenefitLvlLinesForTierProduct
SelectSQLQuery.STATIC: SELECT DISTINCT p_tier.blvl_bnft_frqncy_qlfr, p_tier.blvl_bnft_lvl_desc, p_tier.blvl_bnft_lvl_id FROM prod_bnft_tier_custmzd p_tier, CNTRCT_BNFT_TIER_CUSTMZD c_tier WHERE c_tier.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = {0} and c_tier.dt_sgmnt_sys_id = {1} and c_tier.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = p_tier.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID and c_tier.blvl_bnft_lvl_id = p_tier.blvl_bnft_lvl_id and c_tier.cntrct_tier_sys_id {2} and c_tier.prod_sys_id = p_tier.prod_sys_id and c_tier.bnft_defn_sys_id = p_tier.bnft_defn_sys_id and c_tier.bnft_sys_id = p_tier.bnft_sys_id

SelectSQLQuery.name: getBenefitLvlLinesForContract
SelectSQLQuery.STATIC: SELECT UNIQUE c.BNFT_LVL_SQNC , e.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID , e.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_DESC , GETREFDATADESC(c.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_QLFR,1935) CD_DESC_TXT , h.CD_DESC_TXT , d.BNFT_LVL_EXTRNL_RFRNC_ID , e.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID , t.DTYP_DATA_TYPE_ID , t.DTYP_DATA_TYPE_NAME , i.CD_DESC_TXT , e.BVAL_BNFT_VAL , t.DTYP_DATA_TYPE_LGND , i.PRMRY_CD , d.LINE_VAL , c.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_TERM , c.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_QLFR , GETREFDATADESC(C.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_TERM,1934) CD_DESC_TXT , e.CNTRCT_TIER_SYS_ID , DECODE(nn.NOTE_BENLINE_ID,NULL, 'N','Y') notes_exists, f.TIER_DEFN_SYS_ID , e.BLVL_BNFT_FRQNCY_QLFR , DECODE(p_tier.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID,null,p_non_tier.blvl_bnft_frqncy_qlfr,p_tier.blvl_bnft_frqncy_qlfr) prod_frqncy_qlfr, DECODE(p_tier.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID,null,p_non_tier.blvl_bnft_lvl_desc,p_tier.blvl_bnft_lvl_desc) prod_lvl_desc FROM BLVL_BNFT_LVL c , BLN_BNFT_LINE d , CNTRCT_BNFT_TIER_CUSTMZD e , CNTRCT_TIER_MSTR f , -- item g , item h , item i , -- item j , DTYP_DATA_TYPE t , (SELECT DISTINCT SCNDRY_ENTY_ID AS NOTE_BENLINE_ID, TIER_SYS_ID FROM TIER_NOTE_OVRD_VAL WHERE PRMRY_ENTY_TYPE = 'ATTACHCONTRACT' AND SCNDRY_ENTY_TYPE ='ATTACHBNFTLINE' AND BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = {0} AND PRMRY_ENTY_ID = {1} AND NOTE_OVRD_STTS ='F' AND TIER_SYS_ID {2} ) nn, prod_bnft_cstmzd p_non_tier,prod_bnft_tier_custmzd p_tier WHERE c.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID = e.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID AND d.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID = e.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID AND d.DTYP_DATA_TYPE_ID = t.DTYP_DATA_TYPE_ID AND e.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID = d.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID AND c.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID = e.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID AND d.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID = e.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID AND e.CNTRCT_TIER_SYS_ID = f.CNTRCT_TIER_SYS_ID -- AND c.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_TERM = j.PRMRY_CD(+) -- AND j.CTLG_ID(+) = 1934 -- Term -- AND c.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_QLFR = g.PRMRY_CD(+) -- AND g.CTLG_ID(+) = 1935 -- Qualifier AND d.BNFT_LVL_EXTRNL_RFRNC_ID = h.PRMRY_CD (+) AND h.CTLG_ID (+) = 1938 -- Reference AND d.BLN_BNFT_LINE_PVA = i.PRMRY_CD AND i.CTLG_ID = 1936 -- Provider Arrangement AND e.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID = nn.NOTE_BENLINE_ID(+) AND e.CNTRCT_TIER_SYS_ID = nn.TIER_SYS_ID(+) AND e.CNTRCT_TIER_SYS_ID {2} AND e.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = {0} AND e.dt_sgmnt_sys_id = {1} AND e.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = p_non_tier.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID AND e.blvl_bnft_lvl_id = p_non_tier.blvl_bnft_lvl_id AND e.prod_sys_id = p_non_tier.prod_sys_id AND e.bnft_defn_sys_id = p_non_tier.bnft_defn_sys_id AND e.bnft_sys_id = p_non_tier.bnft_sys_id AND e.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = p_tier.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID(+) AND e.blvl_bnft_lvl_id = p_tier.blvl_bnft_lvl_id(+) AND e.prod_sys_id = p_tier.prod_sys_id(+) AND e.bnft_defn_sys_id = p_tier.bnft_defn_sys_id(+) AND e.bnft_sys_id = p_tier.bnft_sys_id(+) ORDER BY e.CNTRCT_TIER_SYS_ID, c.BNFT_LVL_SQNC , i.PRMRY_CD ASC

SelectSQLQuery.name: getBenefitTierTermsAndPVAsForContract
SelectSQLQuery.STATIC: SELECT LVL.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_TERM,TIERCUST.CNTRCT_TIER_SYS_ID,LINE.BLN_BNFT_LINE_PVA, dbms_random.random FROM BLVL_BNFT_LVL LVL,BLN_BNFT_LINE LINE,CNTRCT_BNFT_TIER_CUSTMZD TIERCUST WHERE TIERCUST.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = {0} AND TIERCUST.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = {1} AND TIERCUST.CNTRCT_TIER_SYS_ID {2} -- IN ((SELECT column_value FROM TABLE(CAST(Str2tbl({2}) AS nt_varchar2)))) AND LVL.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID = TIERCUST.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID AND LINE.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID = TIERCUST.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID AND LINE.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID=LVL.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID AND LVL.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID=TIERCUST.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID AND LINE.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID=TIERCUST.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID

SelectSQLQuery.name: getProdLvlLinesForContract
SelectSQLQuery.STATIC: SELECT UNIQUE c.BNFT_LVL_SQNC , e.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID , e.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_DESC , GETREFDATADESC(c.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_QLFR,1935) CD_DESC_TXT , h.CD_DESC_TXT , d.BNFT_LVL_EXTRNL_RFRNC_ID , e.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID , t.DTYP_DATA_TYPE_ID , t.DTYP_DATA_TYPE_NAME , i.CD_DESC_TXT , e.BVAL_BNFT_VAL , t.DTYP_DATA_TYPE_LGND , i.PRMRY_CD , d.LINE_VAL , c.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_TERM , c.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_QLFR , GETREFDATADESC(C.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_TERM,1934) CD_DESC_TXT , e.CNTRCT_TIER_SYS_ID , DECODE(nn.NOTE_BENLINE_ID,NULL, 'N','Y') notes_exists, f.TIER_DEFN_SYS_ID , e.BLVL_BNFT_FRQNCY_QLFR , p_non_tier.blvl_bnft_frqncy_qlfr , p_non_tier.blvl_bnft_lvl_desc FROM BLVL_BNFT_LVL c , BLN_BNFT_LINE d , CNTRCT_BNFT_TIER_CUSTMZD e , CNTRCT_TIER_MSTR f , -- item g , item h , item i , -- item j , DTYP_DATA_TYPE t , (SELECT DISTINCT SCNDRY_ENTY_ID AS NOTE_BENLINE_ID, TIER_SYS_ID FROM TIER_NOTE_OVRD_VAL WHERE PRMRY_ENTY_TYPE = 'ATTACHCONTRACT' AND SCNDRY_ENTY_TYPE ='ATTACHBNFTLINE' AND BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = {0} AND PRMRY_ENTY_ID = {1} AND NOTE_OVRD_STTS ='F' AND TIER_SYS_ID {2} ) nn, prod_bnft_cstmzd p_non_tier WHERE c.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID = e.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID AND d.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID = e.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID AND d.DTYP_DATA_TYPE_ID = t.DTYP_DATA_TYPE_ID AND e.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID = d.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID AND c.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID = e.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID AND d.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID = e.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID AND e.CNTRCT_TIER_SYS_ID = f.CNTRCT_TIER_SYS_ID -- AND c.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_TERM = j.PRMRY_CD(+) -- AND j.CTLG_ID(+) = 1934 -- Term -- AND c.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_QLFR = g.PRMRY_CD(+) -- AND g.CTLG_ID(+) = 1935 -- Qualifier AND d.BNFT_LVL_EXTRNL_RFRNC_ID = h.PRMRY_CD (+) AND h.CTLG_ID (+) = 1938 -- Reference AND d.BLN_BNFT_LINE_PVA = i.PRMRY_CD AND i.CTLG_ID = 1936 -- Provider Arrangement AND e.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID = nn.NOTE_BENLINE_ID(+) AND e.CNTRCT_TIER_SYS_ID = nn.TIER_SYS_ID(+) AND e.CNTRCT_TIER_SYS_ID {2} AND e.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = {0} AND e.dt_sgmnt_sys_id = {1} AND e.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = p_non_tier.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID AND e.blvl_bnft_lvl_id = p_non_tier.blvl_bnft_lvl_id AND e.prod_sys_id = p_non_tier.prod_sys_id AND e.bnft_defn_sys_id = p_non_tier.bnft_defn_sys_id AND e.bnft_sys_id = p_non_tier.bnft_sys_id ORDER BY e.CNTRCT_TIER_SYS_ID, c.BNFT_LVL_SQNC , i.PRMRY_CD ASC

SelectSQLQuery.name: getBenefitLvlLinesForProduct
SelectSQLQuery.STATIC: select unique c.BNFT_LVL_SQNC,e.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID,e.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_DESC, GETREFDATADESC(c.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_QLFR,1935) CD_DESC_TXT,h.CD_DESC_TXT,d.BNFT_LVL_EXTRNL_RFRNC_ID, e.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID,t.DTYP_DATA_TYPE_ID,t.DTYP_DATA_TYPE_NAME , i.CD_DESC_TXT ,e.BVAL_BNFT_VAL,t.DTYP_DATA_TYPE_LGND,i.PRMRY_CD, d.LINE_VAL,c.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_TERM,c.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_QLFR,GETREFDATADESC(c.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_TERM,1934) CD_DESC_TXT,e.PROD_TIER_SYS_ID, DECODE(nn.NOTE_BENLINE_ID,null, 'N','Y') notes_exists, f.TIER_DEFN_SYS_ID, e.BLVL_BNFT_FRQNCY_QLFR,a.BLVL_BNFT_FRQNCY_QLFR,a.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_DESC from BLVL_BNFT_LVL c,BLN_BNFT_LINE d,PROD_BNFT_TIER_CUSTMZD e, PROD_TIER_MSTR f, --item g, item h,item i, --item j, DTYP_DATA_TYPE t, (select DISTINCT SCNDRY_ENTY_ID as NOTE_BENLINE_ID,TIER_SYS_ID from TIER_NOTE_OVRD_VAL where PRMRY_ENTY_TYPE = 'ATTACHPRODUCT' and SCNDRY_ENTY_TYPE ='ATTACHBNFTLINE'and BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = {0} and PRMRY_ENTY_ID = {1} and NOTE_OVRD_STTS ='F' and TIER_SYS_ID {2}) nn, PROD_BNFT_CSTMZD k,PROD_STRCTR_BNFT_CSTMZD a where c.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID = e.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID and d.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID = e.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID AND d.DTYP_DATA_TYPE_ID = t.DTYP_DATA_TYPE_ID and e.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID = d.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID and c.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID = e.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID and d.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID = e.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID and e.PROD_TIER_SYS_ID = f.PROD_TIER_SYS_ID -- and c.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_TERM = j.PRMRY_CD(+) and j.CTLG_ID(+) = 1934 -- Term -- and c.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_QLFR = g.PRMRY_CD(+) and g.CTLG_ID(+) = 1935 -- Qualifier and d.BNFT_LVL_EXTRNL_RFRNC_ID = h.PRMRY_CD (+) and h.CTLG_ID (+) = 1938 -- Reference and d.BLN_BNFT_LINE_PVA = i.PRMRY_CD and i.CTLG_ID = 1936 -- Provider Arrangement and e.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID = nn.NOTE_BENLINE_ID(+) and e.PROD_TIER_SYS_ID = nn.TIER_SYS_ID(+) and e.PROD_TIER_SYS_ID {2} and e.PROD_SYS_ID = k.PROD_SYS_ID and e.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID= k.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID and e.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID = k.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID and a.PROD_STRCTR_SYS_ID = k.PROD_STRCTR_SYS_ID and a.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID= k.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID and a.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID = e.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID and a.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID = k.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID and a.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID = e.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID and a.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID = d.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID ORDER BY e.PROD_TIER_SYS_ID,c.BNFT_LVL_SQNC,i.PRMRY_CD asc

DataSource.SelectSQLQuery: SELECT TD.TIER_DEFN_SYS_ID,TD.TIER_DESC,TD.DATA_TYP,TC.TIER_CRTRIA_SYS_ID,TC.CRTRIA_NM,TC.TIER_CRTRIA_IND,NVL(TCPV.PSBL_VAL,'###'),TCPV.CRTRIA_VAL_DESC FROM TIER_CRTRIA TC, TIER_CRTRIA_PSBL_VAL TCPV ,TIER_DEFN TD , prod_tier_defn_ovrd PTDO WHERE td.tier_defn_sys_id=tc.tier_defn_sys_id AND tc.tier_crtria_sys_id = tcpv.tier_crtria_sys_id (+) and td.tier_defn_sys_id= ptdo.tier_defn_sys_id and PTDO.PROD_SYS_ID ={0} and PTDO.BNFT_COMP_SYS_ID={1} and PTDO.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID={2} order by TD.TIER_DESC,TC.DSPLY_SQNC_NBR

SELECT distinct a.note_id,b.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID FROM TIER_NOTE_OVRD_VAL a,CNTRCT_BNFT_TIER_CUSTMZD b,BLN_BNFT_LINE c ,BLVL_BNFT_LVL d ,BMST_BNFT_MSTR e, BCM_BNFT_CMPNT_MSTR f,NMST_NOTE_MSTR g WHERE a.prmry_enty_type='ATTACHCONTRACT' AND a.prmry_enty_id in (SELECT a.dt_sgmnt_sys_id FROM cntrct_dt_sgmnt a, cntrct_dt_sgmnt_assn b WHERE a.dt_sgmnt_sys_id = b.dt_sgmnt_sys_id AND b.cntrct_sys_id = {0} AND (a.dt_sgmnt_stts_cd = 'BUILDING' OR a.dt_sgmnt_stts_cd = 'CHECKED_OUT') ) AND b.dt_sgmnt_sys_id = a.prmry_enty_id AND b.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id = a.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id AND a.scndry_enty_id = b.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID AND a.scndry_enty_type ='ATTACHBNFTLINE' AND (b.BVAL_BNFT_VAL is null OR trim(b.BVAL_BNFT_VAL)='') AND b.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID = c.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID AND b.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID = d.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID AND c.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID = d.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID AND b.BNFT_SYS_ID = e.BNFT_SYS_ID AND b.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = f.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID AND a.NOTE_ID = g.NOTE_ID AND a.NOTE_VRSN_NBR = g.NOTE_VRSN_NBR AND a.TIER_SYS_ID = b.CNTRCT_TIER_SYS_ID AND b.bnft_hide_flag = 'F' AND a.NOTE_OVRD_STTS ='F'

Select temp.note_id,temp.NOTE_VRSN_NBR ,temp.BLN_BNFT_LINE_PVA,temp.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_DESC, temp.BNFT_ID_NM , temp.BNFT_CMPNT_NM, temp.NOTE_NM,temp.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID,temp.CNTRCT_TIER_SYS_ID from (SELECT distinct a.note_id,a.NOTE_VRSN_NBR ,c.BLN_BNFT_LINE_PVA,d.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_DESC, E.BNFT_ID_NM , f.BNFT_CMPNT_NM, g.NOTE_NM,c.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID ,p.SQNC_NBR,q.SQNC_NBR,d.BNFT_LVL_SQNC,b.CNTRCT_TIER_SYS_ID, e.BNFT_SYS_ID FROM TIER_NOTE_OVRD_VAL a,CNTRCT_BNFT_TIER_CUSTMZD b,BLN_BNFT_LINE c ,BLVL_BNFT_LVL d ,BMST_BNFT_MSTR e, BCM_BNFT_CMPNT_MSTR f,NMST_NOTE_MSTR g,PROD_BNFT_CMPNT_ASSN p,BNFT_CMPNT_HRCHY_ASSN q WHERE a.prmry_enty_type='ATTACHCONTRACT'AND a.prmry_enty_id = {0} AND b.dt_sgmnt_sys_id = a.prmry_enty_id AND b.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id = a.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id AND a.scndry_enty_id = b.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID AND a.scndry_enty_type ='ATTACHBNFTLINE' AND (b.BVAL_BNFT_VAL is null OR trim(b.BVAL_BNFT_VAL)='') AND b.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID = c.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID AND b.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID = d.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID AND c.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID = d.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID AND b.BNFT_SYS_ID = e.BNFT_SYS_ID AND b.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = f.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID AND a.NOTE_ID = g.NOTE_ID AND a.NOTE_VRSN_NBR = g.NOTE_VRSN_NBR AND b.bnft_hide_flag = 'F' AND a.NOTE_OVRD_STTS = 'F' AND p.PROD_SYS_ID = b.PROD_SYS_ID AND p.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = f.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID AND q.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = f.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID AND q.BNFT_SYS_ID = e.BNFT_SYS_ID AND a.TIER_SYS_ID = b.CNTRCT_TIER_SYS_ID ORDER BY b.CNTRCT_TIER_SYS_ID,p.SQNC_NBR,q.SQNC_NBR,d.BNFT_LVL_SQNC )temp where ROWNUM <= {1}

select unique A.CNTRCT_TIER_SYS_ID, B.TIER_CRTRIA_SYS_ID, B.CRTRIA_VAL,A.TIER_DEFN_SYS_ID,C.TIER_DESC,D.CRTRIA_NM,D.DSPLY_SQNC_NBR,D.TIER_CRTRIA_IND,C.DATA_TYP from CNTRCT_TIER_MSTR A, CNTRCT_TIER_CRTRIA_VAL B, TIER_DEFN C, TIER_CRTRIA D where A.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID ={0} AND A.CNTRCT_TIER_SYS_ID =B.CNTRCT_TIER_SYS_ID AND A.TIER_DEFN_SYS_ID =C.TIER_DEFN_SYS_ID AND B.TIER_CRTRIA_SYS_ID =D.TIER_CRTRIA_SYS_ID AND A.CNTRCT_TIER_SYS_ID {1} ORDER BY C.TIER_DESC,A.CNTRCT_TIER_SYS_ID,D.DSPLY_SQNC_NBR

SELECT A.NOTE_ID FROM TIER_NOTE_OVRD_VAL A, CNTRCT_BNFT_ASSN G,QSTNR_MSTR QSTNR,BNFT_ADMIN_TO_LVL_ASSN BNFTAOPT WHERE A.PRMRY_ENTY_TYPE='ATTACHCONTRACT' AND A.PRMRY_ENTY_ID IN ( SELECT A.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID FROM CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT A, CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT_ASSN B WHERE A.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = B.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID AND B.CNTRCT_SYS_ID = {0} ) AND A.PRMRY_ENTY_ID = G.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID AND A.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = G.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID AND A.SCNDRY_ENTY_TYPE ='ATTACHQUESTION' AND G.BNFT_HIDE_FLAG = 'F' and BNFTAOPT.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID = G.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID AND QSTNR.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR = A.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR AND (A.TIER_SYS_ID,A.SCNDRY_ENTY_ID, QSTNR.QSTNR_HRCHY_SYS_ID) NOT IN ( SELECT DISTINCT CNTRCT_TIER_SYS_ID,ADMIN_LVL_OPT_ASSN_SYS_ID,QSTNR_HRCHY_SYS_ID FROM CNTRCT_TIER_ANSWR_OVRD WHERE DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = A.PRMRY_ENTY_ID AND A.SCNDRY_ENTY_ID = ADMIN_LVL_OPT_ASSN_SYS_ID AND BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = A.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID ) AND BNFTAOPT.ADMIN_LVL_OPT_ASSN_SYS_ID = A.SCNDRY_ENTY_ID AND BNFTAOPT.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID=QSTNR.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID

SELECT A.NOTE_ID,A.NOTE_VRSN_NBR, BMST.BNFT_ID_NM, BCM.BNFT_CMPNT_NM, NMST.NOTE_NM,A.TIER_SYS_ID, ADQM.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_DESC, A.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR, AOP.ADMIN_OPT_DESC_TXT, BNFTAOP.ADMIN_LVL_OPT_ASSN_SYS_ID FROM TIER_NOTE_OVRD_VAL A, CNTRCT_BNFT_ASSN G,ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_MSTR ADQM,BDM_BNFT_DEFN_MSTR BDM,BMST_BNFT_MSTR BMST, BNFT_ADMIN_TO_LVL_ASSN BNFTAOP, ADMIN_OPT_MSTR AOP, BCM_BNFT_CMPNT_MSTR BCM,NMST_NOTE_MSTR NMST, QSTNR_MSTR QSTNR, CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT DTSG, PROD_BNFT_CMPNT_ASSN PROD_BC,BNFT_CMPNT_HRCHY_ASSN BHRCY WHERE A.PRMRY_ENTY_TYPE='ATTACHCONTRACT' AND A.PRMRY_ENTY_ID = G.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID AND A.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = G.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID AND A.SCNDRY_ENTY_TYPE ='ATTACHQUESTION' AND G.BNFT_HIDE_FLAG = 'F' AND QSTNR.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR = A.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR AND (A.TIER_SYS_ID,A.SCNDRY_ENTY_ID, QSTNR.QSTNR_HRCHY_SYS_ID) NOT IN ( SELECT DISTINCT CNTRCT_TIER_SYS_ID,ADMIN_LVL_OPT_ASSN_SYS_ID,QSTNR_HRCHY_SYS_ID FROM CNTRCT_TIER_ANSWR_OVRD WHERE DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = A.PRMRY_ENTY_ID AND BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID=A.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID AND ADMIN_LVL_OPT_ASSN_SYS_ID=A.SCNDRY_ENTY_ID AND AOP.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID = BNFTAOP.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID ) AND ADQM.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR = A.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR AND BDM.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID = A.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID AND BDM.BNFT_SYS_ID = BMST.BNFT_SYS_ID AND BNFTAOP.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID = G.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID AND BNFTAOP.ADMIN_LVL_OPT_ASSN_SYS_ID = A.SCNDRY_ENTY_ID AND AOP.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID = BNFTAOP.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID AND BCM.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = A.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID AND NMST.NOTE_ID=A.NOTE_ID AND NMST.NOTE_VRSN_NBR = A.NOTE_VRSN_NBR AND DTSG.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = A.PRMRY_ENTY_ID AND DTSG.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = {0} AND PROD_BC.PROD_SYS_ID = DTSG.PROD_SYS_ID AND PROD_BC.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = A.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID AND BHRCY.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = PROD_BC.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID AND BHRCY.BNFT_SYS_ID = BMST.BNFT_SYS_ID AND QSTNR.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID = BNFTAOP.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID ORDER BY PROD_BC.SQNC_NBR, BHRCY.SQNC_NBR, BNFTAOP.SQNC_NBR, QSTNR.SQNC_NBR
